description: Unified care calendar for pets, plants, and home maintenance. One app to track watering schedules, vet appointments, filter changes, and seasonal tasks. Cross-category care management.
target_user: Busy households juggling pet care, plant care, and home maintenance who want one system instead of multiple apps
core_loop: Add care items (pets, plants, appliances, vehicles)
Set care schedules (daily feeding, weekly watering, annual service)
See upcoming care needs on calendar view
